hero.title: All-in-One Video Enhancements
hero.subtitle: 30+ features in one, the ultimate video experience enhancement browser extension with multi-platform support, helping you easily master your video experience.
hero.usersTrust: Trusted by 30,000+ users around the world
hero.featured: Featured on Chrome Web Store / Edge Addons

features.title: Absolute Privacy Protection
features.desc: The extension does not collect any user information and we use Chrome's built-in API to ensure user privacy and security.

features.title: Extensive Platform Support
features.desc: Supports all websites and platforms using HTML5 video, enjoy enhanced experience anytime, anywhere.

features.title: 30+ Features
features.desc: 30+ features in one, no need to download multiple extensions, one extension handles all your needs. Not just rotation, zoom, picture-in-picture, stretch, loop, speed control, VR, screenshot, filters, download... but also volume enhancement, audio delay, pitch adjustment, 3D surround effects, and more.

features.title: Built-in Independent Web Player
features.desc: For features not supported by local players, you can directly upload video files to Video Roll for playback and enjoy all Video Roll features.

features.title: Customizable Shortcuts
features.desc: Support custom shortcuts, operate more efficiently and conveniently without opening the extension.

features.title: YouTube Feature Enhancement
features.desc: For YouTube, provides automatic ad detection and accelerated playback (not ad blocking), and video AI summarization. Making your YouTube experience richer.

features.title: Multi-window Sync
features.desc: Sync playback progress across multiple windows, switch more freely.

features.title: Volume Enhancement
features.desc: Increase volume limit, hear more clearly.

features.title: Subtitle Translation
features.desc: One-click subtitle translation, barrier-free across languages.

advantages.title: Open Source
advantages.desc: Open source code, safe and reliable

reviews.comment: Ad skip is awesome, great experience.

privacy.title: Data and Privacy Statement
privacy.intro: We take your data security and privacy protection very seriously. This plugin promises:

policies.0: Your personal information is only used for account login and basic service functions
policies.1: We will not use your data for any commercial promotion purposes
policies.2: Your data will not be leaked or sold to any third parties
policies.4: You can delete your account and related data at any time

privacy.footer: For more details, please check our complete privacy policy. If you have any questions, please contact us at any time.

subscription.title: Subscription Information
subscription.freePlanDesc: You are using the free plan and enjoying all basic features

auth.agreementText: By registering/signing in, you agree to our

cookie.title: Cookie Notice
cookie.subtitle: We respect your privacy
cookie.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience, provide essential functionality, and analyze site performance. You can customize your preferences below.
cookie.login_restriction: Rejecting functional cookies will disable login and registration features.
cookie.necessary_description: These cookies are essential for basic website functionality, including authentication, security, and core features. They cannot be disabled.
cookie.functional_description: These cookies enable enhanced features like user preferences, settings, and improved functionality. Required for login/registration.
cookie.analytics_description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
cookie.marketing_description: These cookies track visitors across websites to display relevant and personalized advertisements.
cookie.preferences_description: Manage your cookie preferences and understand how we use cookies on our website.
cookie.functional_examples: User preferences, language settings, enhanced features
cookie.analytics_examples: Google Analytics, visitor statistics, performance metrics
cookie.confirm_clear_all: Are you sure you want to clear all cookie preferences? This will reset all settings to default.
cookie.help_item_1: Necessary cookies are always enabled for basic functionality
cookie.help_item_2: Functional cookies are required for login and registration features
cookie.help_item_3: You can change your preferences at any time from this page
cookie.cookie_consent_required: To use login and registration features, you need to accept functional cookies. These cookies are necessary for authentication and security.
cookie.cookie_explanation: Functional cookies enable secure login, session management, and enhanced user experience. Without them, authentication features cannot work properly.

downloadVideo.title: Video Download Tools
downloadVideo.description: Discover the best video download tools and services to help you save videos from your favorite platforms.
downloadVideo.footerNote: These tools are provided for informational purposes. Please respect copyright and terms of service of video platforms.
downloadVideo.footerDisclaimer: Always ensure you have permission to download content and comply with applicable laws and regulations.

snapany.description: Fast and convenient online video download tool supporting multiple video formats

cobalt.description: Open-source social media download tool with privacy protection focus

yt-dlp.description: Most powerful video download tool supporting 1000+ websites

y2mate.description: Online video downloader, simple and easy to use without installation

savefrom.description: Quickly download videos from major platforms with HD quality support

clipgrab.description: Desktop video download software with format conversion support

4k-downloader.description: Professional video download tool with 4K HD support

online-video-converter.description: Online video conversion and download platform

tubemate.description: Popular video download app for Android platform

videoproc.description: All-in-one video processing software with download features
